Html:
Just want to say first of all great, great project. I have been using it for a couple of months and have had wonderful success with the WPF version of this control.

I am having an issue with showing a bitmap on a layer in the Windows Forms version. When zoomed out, the bitmap shows in Alaska, but the more I zoom in the more the bitmap goes to its correct location around the lower portion of California.

I have checked and I am sending it the correct coordinates, and code that is very similar is working in the WPF version of this control.

Any help is greatly appreciated.

Nevermind, ID10T error.

I had accidentally copied in some code that had an offset and that what was causing it.

Couldn't see the forest for the trees :D
;} also you can check Demo.Clouds testing project
